= KEYPAIR =

== SSH KEYPAIR ==
=== ed25519 ===
<pre>
ssh-keygen -t ed25519 
Generating public/private ed25519 key pair.
</pre>

=== RSA ===
<pre>
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096
</pre>

=== ADD  ===
<pre>
% eval "$(ssh-agent -s)"                                
Agent pid 1623
% .ssh % open ~/.ssh/config
The file /Users/na/.ssh/config does not exist.
% .ssh % touch ~/.ssh/config
% .ssh % vi ~/.ssh/config
    Host *
    AddKeysToAgent yes
    UseKeychain yes
    IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_ed25519

% ssh-add -K ~/.ssh/id_ed25519
